content.question: The figure above shows the magnetic forces acting on two parallel horizontal wires. Which of the following statements about the currents in the wires is correct?

choices.label: Both currents are to the right
Both currents are to the left.
Both currents are in the same direction, but it could be either right or left.
The currents are in opposite directions.

content.answer: The currents are in opposite directions.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
